DatabaseTest¶

Test of the function which creates a singleton connection of database.

class test.test_database.TestModel[source]¶

The base class of all test class to test the persistent objects in the model. The class create a mock object of the singleton database connec- tion in the setUp function, which would be inherited by all son classes. Then you can use self.mock_db to replace the connection in your database function.

class TestPersistentObject(TestModel):
    def test_action(self):
        # Set the return value
        self.mock_db.get.return_value = 'test'

        # Now mock_db is replaced of the connection
        assert action() == 'test'
setUp()[source]¶

Set up a mock object of the singleton database and a mock object of options.

test.test_database.test_get_connection(*args, **keywargs)[source]¶

Test database.get_connection decorator
